TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion extends System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion

Docs.summary: Defines an editable region of content within the design-time markup for the associated control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition templateDefinition) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition"> instance for the template to edit.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion"> class using the provided template definition.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsSingleInstanceTemplate { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether the template occurs only once per instance of the containing control, such as a h`eader` template, or can appear many times according to available data, such as an i`tem` template.
Docs.value: `true` if the template appears only once; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool SupportsDataBinding { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the template can be bound to a data source.
Docs.value: `true` if the template represented by the region can be bound to a data source; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition"> object describing the template that is referenced by the region.
